attributes.action: comment on the resign petition now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The resign petition has more than twice the number of signatures than Mr Brown had votes in the last election.  So Mr Brown should comment on this petition now, rather than wait till 22 October, when the petition ends.  Also less than 100 people have signed the petition asking him to stay and more than 61000 have signed the petition asking him to go.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
